Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg

Class RequestResponseExtensions

java.lang.Object
io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.RequestResponseExtensions
public class RequestResponseExtensions extends Object
Groovy extensions of the RequestResponse class to provide Groovy DSL enhancements.

    • responder

      public static io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.Request responder(io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.Request self, @DelegatesTo(value=io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.Response.class,strategy=1) groovy.lang.Closure closure)
      Allows for configuration of a Response by the given Groovy Closure, which will delegate to a Response instance passed into it for configuration using the Groovy DSL.
      Parameters:
      self - the type of object being extended
      closure - the Closure<Response> to provide configuration of the response
      Returns:
      a reference to this request

    • chunked

      public static io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.Response chunked(io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.Response self, @DelegatesTo(value=io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.cfg.ChunkingConfig.class,strategy=1) groovy.lang.Closure closure)
      Allows for configuration of a chunked response using a Groovy Closure, which will delegate to a ChunkingConfig instance passed into it for configuration using the Groovy DSL.
      Parameters:
      self - the type of object being extended
      closure - the Closure to provide configuration
      Returns:
      a reference to the configured response
